title: Bug 49536: No Content Returned for URL Access in Tomcat 7 with No Webapps Deployed
description: When accessing a URL in Tomcat 7 with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL in Tomcat 7 with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: The server should return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL in Tomcat 7 with no webapps deployed.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps
3. Access a URL
